projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: Youtube & Social Media
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Youtube & Social Media


Description: Manage content creation, editing & co-ordinate the the shoots for

the new youtube & social projects.

Skill sets: Experience of running & own channel, Video Editing, Adobe After

Effects, Adobe Premier Pro, etc.

Expected learning: Work with key content creators, leading doctors & the

founders to run & scale the channel. Ground level experience of scaling a

business channel for user engagement & growth.

Specific courses required for project execution: None compulsory, Good to have -

Print Audio & Visual Ad, Creative Writing, Short film & video production.
